INTROORG.content_page1: We hope you enjoy using this platform as much as we did when putting it together. Any questions as meaningless as they can seem, please send them to carlos@sponzor.me
INTROORG.head_page2: Let’s start by exploring your dashboard.
INTROORG.content_page2: The first thing you will see in this area is a summary of everything that is happening. You will be able to see a global summary, an event summary, a sponsor summary and a few suggestions that our team of experts has prepared for you.
INTROORG.content_page3:
You will be able to find the following:

  • Dashboard: Shows a summary of all your activities.
  • Events: Allows you to create, edit, and manage your events.
  • Sponzors: Allows you to create, edit, and manage your sponsors.
  • Task List: You can manage your agreements with your sponsors and allows you to keep a good relationship with them.
  • Invite your friends: Spread the love. Send it to someone that might need something like this and that will enjoy it.
  • Settings: You will be able to update your information and connect your external accounts.
  • Disconnect: You can log out of our platform in a safe way. We know this will be temporal because we love you.

INTROSPO.content_page1: We hope you enjoy using this platform as much as we did when putting it together. Any questions as meaningless as they can seem, please send them to carlos@sponzor.me
INTROSPO.head_page2: Let’s start by exploring your dashboard.
INTROSPO.content_page2: The first thing you will see in this area is a search box. Simply type the magic words that describe the event that you are looking for and let us find the events that might interest you.
INTROSPO.content_page3:
You will be able to find the following:

  • Dashboard: To come back to the search box.
  • Following: The events you want to sponsor which hasn’t been accepted by the organizer yet.
  • Sponsored: The events you are currently sponsoring, the agreements you have with the organizers, and activities that you might forget in the last minute such as sending those T-shirts.
  • Invite your friends : Spread the love. Send it to someone that might need something like this and that will enjoy it.
  • Settings: You will be able to update your information and connect your external accounts.
  • Disconnect: You can log out of our platform in a safe way. We know this will be temporal because we love you.
